backgrounds.personal: I am a first generation college student meaning I am the first in my family to attend a four year university in pursuit of a bachelor's degree. I am an eagle scout and have been to the Philmont scouting range for a 11 day long backpacking trip.
backgrounds.professional: I have volunteered at my local church in the audio visual team from 2014 to today
backgrounds.academic: Senior Computer Science Major with a Concentration in Cyber Security

courses.name: Intro into Operating Systems and Networking

personalStatement: Hello my name is Justin Madren this will be my senior year at UNCC. I enjoy playing video games right now. I am working my way through Balders Gate 3 in honor mode, I also enjoy drawing traditionally and on my tablet from time to time.
